Quality control -> External QC: Introduction

Introduction

External quality control (which may be enforced by law) checks whether different laboratories produce comparable results on the same material. In that case, the control samples may not even be recognizable as such. This scheduling can be defined by the LIMS, but this is not mandatory. Analyzers may send 'unsolicited' quality control results to the LIMS. In any case, quality control results must be stored to enable the quality control itself.'

QC population export screen

The QC result export program is available via the contextual function Export on QC population. 

Format

Is either Qbase or Biorad (the extra options are for future use).  

Note

The only difference between QBase version 3 and version 4 is that the number of sample records (SI or SE) are limited to one per QC population, where in version 3 there is a sample record preceding each result record of the population.

Specifics

Allows to set options that are specific for the chosen format.  

Example

For Biorad, this button allows exporting the reagent code instead of the reagent lot number.  It also allows to select/customize the Format (Unity or Flex).

Correspondent

For QBase, the Coding system of the selected corerspondent will be applied.

Set export mark

If enabled, GLIMS will mark the exported QC results.  To use this option, a correspondent must also be specified in the export screen.

In order to be able to clear the export mark, a menu function Remove export mark is available on QC result (Advanced -> Remove export mark).  GLIMS allows to clear either all export marks or only those for a specific correspondent.

Check export mark

If enabled, QC results marked as exported, will not be exported again.

Start date / End date.

Select

Allows specification of the file name and file directory:

Append

If the export file already exists, add this export data to the existing file or overwrite the existing file ?

Logging

To avoid excessive logging during frequent QC export (especially to Biorad), you can disable this option.

Automation

This export program can also be automated by means of commands and tasks.

Base table

QC population

Query

Standard or Extended

Function

Export
